pages.title: Giant Trevally
pages.text: It is normally a silvery colour with occasional dark spots, but males may be black once they mature.$(br2)It is the largest fish in the genus Caranx, growing to a maximum known size of 170 cm ($(o)67 in$()) and a weight of 80 kg ($(o)176 lbs).

pages.title: Giant Trevally
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★★☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
